title: TaskExecutionEventFeed

TaskExecutionEvent.description: An immutable, append-only event recorded during task execution. Used for audit trails and replay feeds.

runId.description: Identifier of the swarm run this event belongs to.

taskId.description: Identifier of the task this event belongs to.

occurredAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred.

taskSequence.description: Monotonically increasing sequence number scoped to the task.

runSequence.description: Monotonically increasing sequence number scoped to the run.

TaskExecutionEventFeed.description: Paginated feed of task execution events returned by replay endpoints.

runId.description: Run identifier, present for run-scoped feeds.

taskId.description: Task identifier, present for task-scoped feeds.

items.description: Ordered list of events (ascending by sequence).

nextCursor.description: Sequence number of the last returned event; pass as `cursor` in the next request to continue pagination. `null` when no events were returned.
